resources.string:
Riddles can help sharpen the mind and
open up new thought processes. Practic- 
 ing them each day can help simplify 
 your thinking, improve memory and 
 enhance cognitive capabilities. 
 
 The besthing is that challenging riddles
can be solved easily... with a few simple 
 techniques.

TSR - Football Edition requires the sharp- 
 est of minds to take on its series of mind 
 twisting riddles. 
 
 Prepare yourself to take on the ultimate 
 footballing trivia chanllenge.

At every stage you'll need to solve five 
 riddles to progress to the next level. 
 Users are to guess the sports personality 
 mentioned, based on being team mates 
 with the former or current players mend- 
 tioned within the riddle. Be it either 
 international or club level.
Hint will cost you 2 coins. Would you \n like to proceed?
Hint will cost you 2 coins. Would you \n like to proceed?
Share a riddle to \n chanllenge your friends

1. Guess the sports personality by typing in the cor- 
 rect answer. 
 
 2. Optional Hint/Super Hints can be redeemed by 
 using coins to help you past a tricky riddle. 
 
 3. Out of coins? Click on the menu icon and go to 
 "Get Coins" for additional coins. 
 
 4. Kick off you Sports Riddle journey and Enjoy\!

Riddles can help sharpen the mind and open up 
 new thought processes. Practicing them each day 
 can help simplify your thinking, improve memory 
 and enhance cognitive capabilitis. The best thing 
 is that challenging riddles can be solved easily \.\.\.
 with a few simple techniques. 
 
 TSR - Foodball Edition requires the sharpest of 
 minds to take on its series of mind twisting riddles. 
 Prepare yourself to take on the ultimate footballing 
 trivia challenge. 
 
 At every stage you'll need to solve five riddles to 
 progress to the next level. Users are to guess the 
 sports personality mentioned, based on being
 team mates with the former or currnt players
 mentioned within the riddle. Be it either interna- 
 tional or club level

Hints\: 
 Should you be stuck on a riddle, you have the 
 option of choosing a hint which will increase your 
 chance of uncovering the answer. 
 
 Super Hints\:
 Super Hints are desinged for user relief during a 
 riddle they just can't solve. It will almost practically 
 give away the answer by droping a major clue to 
 uncover that sports personality.
